description: Comprehensive AWS cloud services integration for infrastructure management, deployment, and monitoring
author: AWS Labs
content: Comprehensive AWS cloud services integration for infrastructure management, deployment, and monitoring.

steps: Install the AWS MCP server: uvx awslabs.core-mcp-server@latest
Open your Claude Desktop configuration file
Add the AWS MCP server configuration with your credentials
Configure AWS authentication (IAM keys, profile, or roles)

useCases: Deploy and manage EC2 instances for web applications
Automate S3 bucket creation and file operations
Deploy Lambda functions for serverless computing
Manage RDS databases and create read replicas
Configure VPC networking and security groups
Set up auto-scaling for high availability
Manage IAM roles and policies for security
security: Support for IAM user credentials and roles
Least privilege access with specific permissions
VPC security groups and network ACLs

troubleshooting.issue: AWS credentials not found or authentication failure
troubleshooting.solution: Run `aws configure` to set access keys. Verify AWS_PROFILE matches profile in ~/.aws/credentials. Test with `aws sts get-caller-identity` command to confirm authentication.

troubleshooting.issue: IAM permissions denied for specific AWS service operations
troubleshooting.solution: Attach required IAM policy (AmazonEC2FullAccess, AmazonS3FullAccess, etc). Use AWS Policy Simulator to test permissions. Verify principal has necessary actions in IAM policy document.

troubleshooting.issue: Resources not found - wrong AWS region configured
troubleshooting.solution: Verify AWS_REGION environment variable matches resource location (us-east-1, eu-west-1, etc). Update with `aws configure set region REGION_NAME`. Check region in AWS Console matches CLI.

troubleshooting.issue: CloudFormation template validation errors or syntax issues
troubleshooting.solution: Validate with `aws cloudformation validate-template --template-body file://template.yaml`. Check resource types match AWS documentation exactly. Verify parameter types and AllowedValues constraints.
Implement exponential backoff for retries (wait 2^n seconds). Reduce concurrent requests to max 10. Request service quota increase at AWS Service Quotas console for sustained high usage.
